page.title: 17INDUSTRY NORTH HYKEHAM
page.content: In the last two decades a large industrial estate has grown around Freeman Road,Station Road and Westminster road.Apart from the large companies George Fischer(castings), Jointines(specialist paper)and N.Wilson(lingerie and leisure wear manufacturers),there are many small businesses. There are several different welders and fabricators each with their own specialist knowledge,experience and business.Ruston Gas Turbines has a Product Support Division and there are several storage,removal and transport companies. Ther are small,specialist mechanics and tool firms.Also planning and designing companies,decorators, heating engineers,security,plant hire and catering firms.
